articles.title: Live results: 2025 Boston mayoral preliminary election
articles.description:
The field of four mayoral candidates — Mayor Michelle Wu and challengers Josh Kraft, Robert Cappucci, and Domingos DaRosa — will be narrowed to two in Tuesday's preliminary election.

The post Live results: 2025 Boston mayoral preliminary election appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston's preliminary mayoral election on September 9 narrows candidates to two.
Current Mayor Michelle Wu faces challengers Josh Kraft, Robert Cappucci, and Domingos DaRosa.
The election outcome will significantly influence Boston's leadership and policies.
